Compatible with PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, and Hugging Face.
Supports NVIDIA A100, H100, and RTX Series GPUs.
Deployable on AWS, GCP, Azure, and On-Premise.
SOC 2 Type II and GDPR compliant.

omissions: Specific platform features mentioned under icons: Auto-Optimization and Real-time Analytics.

fabrications: The summary includes endorsements from Andrew Ng, MIT Technology Review, TechCrunch, The Information, and the Reddit community /r/MachineLearning, which are not present in the visible article text. These were extracted from the webpage's underlying HTML.

The summary states the company has 'gained recognition in the AI industry for its innovative technology', which is an inference based on the non-visible endorsements rather than a direct claim in the visible text.
delta_report.details: The tone of the visible article is purely 'Promotional', using direct marketing language and calls to action. The summary's tone was classified as 'Promotional & Authoritative' because it incorporated third-party endorsements (MIT Technology Review, Andrew Ng) found in the page's hidden HTML. This created a slight drift by adding a layer of external validation not apparent in the visible text alone.
